translation.en: [narrator] A superb bird of paradise calls for a mate.
The pursuit of love is his life's work.
translation.ko: 사랑을 좇는 것이 일생의 목표인 새죠

translation.en: But looking good is only half the story.
To seal the deal, he must charm her with his dance.
translation.ko: 짝짓기에 성공하려면 멋진 춤으로 암컷을 유혹해야 하죠

translation.en: When it comes to courting a partner,
this superb bird of paradise is not the only bird
translation.ko: 보기 드문 구애 동작을 선보이는 새는

translation.en: with an extraordinary display.
But as we'll see,
in the world of dancing birds,
it's only the most charming that succeed.
This is New Guinea,
the world's largest jungle-covered island.
In these isolated mountains and valleys,
birds have evolved
translation.ko: 새들은 지구상에서 가장 기이한 구애 행위를

translation.en: some of the most bizarre courtship displays on the planet.
translation.ko: 새들은 지구상에서 가장 기이한 구애 행위를 진화시켜 왔습니다

translation.en: -Meet the King of Saxony. -[high-pitched trilling]
He has the longest head feathers of any bird.
translation.ko: 그 어떤 새보다 가장 긴 머리 깃을 자랑하죠

translation.en: And they're vital for impressing a female.
But first, the king must advertise for a queen.
translation.ko: 왕이 여왕을 찾으려면 일단 널리 알려야 합니다

translation.en: He shares the canopy with hundreds of birds,
translation.ko: 왕은 수백 마리 새들과 높이 뻗은 나무들을 공유하죠

translation.en: but is the right one, here for him?
Mm. That could be her.
Time to head down to his display vine.
translation.ko: 자신의 구애용 나뭇가지로 내려갈 때가 왔습니다

translation.en: She's definitely up there...
translation.ko: 암컷이 저 위에 있는 게 분명합니다

translation.en: but he needs her closer.
And when she is,
he can begin his routine.
She will judge him on everything.
translation.ko: 암컷은 전 영역에 걸쳐 심사할 겁니다

translation.en: How high he swings.
The length of his head feathers.
And how he shakes them.
The higher he scores, the more likely she'll choose him.
translation.ko: 점수가 높을수록 암컷이 선택할 가능성이 큽니다

translation.en: It's decision time.
So, is he the king of the swings?
It seems not.
Oh, well,
back to the search.
Attracting the perfect partner
is a challenge for all male birds of paradise.
translation.ko: 완벽한 짝을 사로잡기란 만만치 않은 과제입니다

translation.en: So some increase their chances
by having a permanent address.
An old, wobbly tree stump.
The top is just three meters off the forest floor.
It doesn't look much,
but it means everything to this black sicklebill.
Or SB for short.
Every morning, SB comes here
in the hope of attracting a female.
And if he can't always be seen...
translation.ko: 눈에 잘 안 띌 경우를 대비해

translation.en: -[raucous chirruping] -he can be heard.
Even in the dense understory, his calls travel far.
translation.ko: 저지대의 울창한 덤불 속에서도 이 구애 소리는 멀리 전해집니다

translation.en: And, when it comes to first impressions,
he has a neat trick up his sleeve.
For years, no one knew why
the black sicklebill had these strange shoulder plumes.
But then, who could have imagined... this?
With no shortage of food in these forests,
male birds of paradise can focus on one thing...
translation.ko: 극락조 수컷들은 한 가지 일에만 집중할 수 있습니다

translation.en: -attracting a mate. -[warbling electronic sound]
His shiny badge of feathers is a sign that he's in tip-top condition.
translation.ko: 반짝거리는 깃털은 최상의 몸 상태를 나타냅니다

translation.en: He just needs a female to spot it.
translation.ko: 그걸 알아봐 줄 암컷만 있으면 되죠

translation.en: But, with no sign of any interest,
SB gets on with his day.
The sicklebill
is not the only pole-dancing bird in these forests.
translation.ko: 폴 댄스를 구사하는 건 낫부리극락조뿐만이 아닙니다

translation.en: The top of this 25-meter tree
has been fashioned into the perfect display post,
-by a twelve-wired bird of paradise. -[suggestive '60s music]
Let's call him... TW.
From up here, TW's call
translation.ko: 이 높이에서 짝을 찾는 TW의 소리는

translation.en: is loud enough to carry to the other side of the valley.
Sadly, no one seems to be listening.
translation.ko: 아쉽게도 듣는 암컷이 없는 것 같군요

translation.en: But if a female came by,
would she be impressed with these moves?
Or that tail?
Twelve-wires are the only birds in the world with a tail like this,
translation.ko: 열두줄극락조와 같은 꽁지깃을 가진 새는 없습니다

translation.en: and it's designed for a very odd kind of courtship.
He just needs a female on his pole.
translation.ko: 암컷이 말뚝 위에 내려앉기만 하면 됩니다

translation.en: SB's post has a visitor,
but it's a young male.
He's not having a bad feather day,
it's just his shoulder pads haven't developed yet.
translation.ko: 어깨 깃이 아직 덜 자란 탓이죠

translation.en: And his shiny badge of feathers...
well, they wouldn't impress anyone.
But you're never too young to try out your moves.
translation.ko: 어리다고 구애 동작을 연습하지 말란 법은 없죠

translation.en: Pretty good,
even if he does look like he's been dragged through the forest backwards.
translation.ko: 숲에서 거꾸로 끌려다닌 것처럼 깃털이 엉망이긴 하지만요

translation.en: TW's pole has a visitor, too,
but it's a metallic starling.
Keen to let others know he's in the area.
translation.ko: 자기가 이 구역에 왔다는 걸 알리고 싶어 합니다

translation.en: The pole is also a great vantage point for spying prey.
translation.ko: 이 말뚝 위에선 먹이를 감시하기에도 좋습니다

translation.en: It seems that every bird in the forest
wants to sit on TW's post.
But if he's ever to attract a mate,
TW must drive off the stream of trespassers.
Now, where are all those female twelve-wires?
translation.ko: 열두줄극락조 암컷은 대체 어디에 있는 거죠?

translation.en: Surely there's one out there.
Scruffy is still at it.
translation.ko: 이 푸석한 녀석은 여전히 연습 중입니다

translation.en: And SB's not happy.
The kid's got guts
but he has to go.
SB knows that no pole means no dates.
translation.ko: 말뚝이 없으면 데이트도 없다는 걸 말뚝 주인은 잘 알죠

translation.en: Back in charge,
it's guns out...
hood up.
-All he needs is a passing female. -[warbling electronic sound]
Aha!
Could this be the one?
It is a female
but not a sicklebill.
Male birds of paradise can go their entire lives
without ever winning a female.
But they're programmed to persevere.
An approaching storm is not good news.
SB knows there's no point dancing in the rain.
translation.ko: SB는 빗속의 춤이 소용없다는 걸 잘 알죠

translation.en: Female birds of paradise never look for partners
translation.ko: 극락조 암컷은 날씨가 좋지 않으면 절대로 수컷을 찾지 않습니다

translation.en: in bad weather.
translation.ko: 날씨가 좋지 않으면 절대로 수컷을 찾지 않습니다

translation.en: Or almost never.
Here's a female that doesn't mind the rain.
translation.ko: 비에 개의치 않는 암컷이 한 마리 있군요

translation.en: TW can't have gone far.
But females have little patience.
Who knows when she'll be back.
translation.ko: 암컷이 언제 다시 올지 누가 알겠어요?

translation.en: TW spends a lot of time gardening and landscaping.
translation.ko: TW는 조경에 시간과 공을 제법 들였습니다

translation.en: It's important work if he wants his display pole
translation.ko: 울창한 나무 사이로 자신의 말뚝이 돋보이길 바란다면

translation.en: to stand out in the canopy.
He's already removed all the leaves from here.
translation.ko: 옆 나무에 달린 잎들도 이미 다 없애버렸습니다

translation.en: This lot could go, too.
But gardening must wait. He has a date.
translation.ko: 조경에 신경 쓸 때가 아니죠 데이트 상대가 찾아왔습니다

translation.en: So, will a leafy gift help to woo her?
No.
For a male bird of paradise,
-life can often be frustrating. -[buzzing continues]
But she hasn't given up on him yet.
He just needs to charm her onto his pole.
translation.ko: 말뚝 위로 암컷을 끌어들이기만 하면 됩니다

translation.en: Strangely,
female twelve-wires like to be flicked across the face
translation.ko: 희한하게도 열두줄극락조 암컷은 수컷의 꽁지깃이 얼굴에 스치는 걸 좋아합니다

translation.en: by a male's tail.
translation.ko: 수컷의 꽁지깃이 얼굴에 스치는 걸 좋아합니다

translation.en: And she'll judge him on this.
So, here goes.
Unfortunately, his technique... is a turn-off.
The pole dancers spend a lot of time hoping they'll be noticed.
translation.ko: 폴 댄서들은 시선을 끌길 바라며 오랜 시간을 투자합니다

translation.en: But SB's wait could be over.
That tweak is a good sign.
But she needs a much closer inspection.
The devil's in the detail.
He's passed the test.
Perseverance has paid off.
Using a tree stump as a display post is one thing.
translation.ko: 구애의 말뚝으로 부러진 나무를 이용하는 것도 독특하지만

translation.en: But for some dancing birds,
the females demand even more.
translation.ko: 암컷의 요구가 더 깐깐한 새들도 있습니다

translation.en: They expect their partners to get creative.
This is a bower.
A stick bower.
It's built to attract a female bowerbird.
Though you could say it's the designer that really catches the eye.
translation.ko: 눈길을 끄는 주인공은 디자이너라고 할 수 있겠지만요

translation.en: A flame bowerbird.
The world's most brightly colored bird.
translation.ko: 전 세계에서 가장 밝은색을 지닌 새죠

translation.en: He spent several days building his bower,
and now he's applying the finishing touches.
But Flame's is not the only kind of bower here.
translation.ko: 하지만 근방에 이 바우어만 있는 건 아닙니다

translation.en: This bower is probably the most ambitious construction
translation.ko: 이 바우어는 동물 한 마리가 지은 구조물 중에

translation.en: made by any single animal.
Here's the guy responsible.
MacGregor's bowerbird.
He may not have the sex appeal of Flame,
but no other bird goes to greater heights to impress the ladies.
translation.ko: 이렇게 구애용 구조물을 높이 짓는 새도 없죠

translation.en: Unlike Flame,
MacGregor spends most of the year
tinkering with his bower.
He works hard on making it bigger and better.
translation.ko: 더 크고 멋진 바우어를 만들려고 분주하게 움직이죠

translation.en: So far, it's been a seven-year labor of love.
Flame's bower, on the other hand, is short-lived,
likely to last just a couple of weeks.
translation.ko: 단 몇 주간만 바우어 짓기에 몰두합니다

translation.en: Even so, every stick has its place.
translation.ko: 그래도 가지마다 위치가 정확히 정해져 있죠

translation.en: And detail is everything.
Happy with his bower,
Flame moves his attention to his backyard.
If he wants to impress a female, it's important to get this right, too.
translation.ko: 암컷 마음에 들려면 이쪽도 제대로 마무리해야죠

translation.en: For both, creating the perfect piece of art is time-consuming work.
translation.ko: 두 바우어새가 완벽한 예술품을 완성하려면 시간이 오래 걸립니다

translation.en: And occasionally frustrating.
If only he had hands.
This isn't MacGregor.
It's his neighbor and rival from along the way.
With no one in, he's come to cause trouble.
translation.ko: 바우어 근처에 아무도 없자 말썽을 일으키러 온 겁니다

translation.en: Bowerbirds can be very jealous.
translation.ko: 바우어새의 질투심은 못 말릴 때도 있습니다

translation.en: But there's a point to this vandalism.
Sabotage your rival's bower...
and yours may look better to a visiting female.
translation.ko: 암컷이 보기엔 자기 바우어가 더 좋아 보이죠

translation.en: Mister Flame is still having his own personal battles,
but he must also watch his back.
When you're the brightest thing in the jungle,
there's always a chance you'll attract the wrong kind of bird.
translation.ko: 필요 없는 관심까지 받게 될 우려가 있으니까요

translation.en: A Doria's hawk.
But he's lost the element of surprise.
MacGregor is back.
And he gets on with the repairs.
His tower is well over a meter tall.
It may be a cliche, but size matters to female bowerbirds.
translation.ko: 진부할 법한 얘기지만 바우어새 암컷은 크기가 커야 성에 찹니다

translation.en: If a male can build and maintain a large tower, it's a sign of good genes.
translation.ko: 커다란 탑을 유지할 수 있는 수컷이라면 좋은 유전자를 가졌다는 징조니까요

translation.en: Next, MacGregor turns his attention to the decor.
translation.ko: 이제 맥그레거는 장식에 신경 쓰기 시작합니다

translation.en: Every bowerbird works in his own medium.
translation.ko: 바우어새는 저마다 선호하는 재료가 따로 있습니다

translation.en: For MacGregor, it's sticky plant sap.
translation.ko: 이 맥그레거는 끈적한 자두 수액을 쓰죠

translation.en: Mm. Nice!
Flame is decorating, too, but he's more... experimental.
translation.ko: 불꽃바우어새도 장식 중인데 좀 더 실험적이죠

translation.en: MacGregor, however, knows just what he wants.
translation.ko: 맥그레거는 자기가 원하는 걸 잘 압니다

translation.en: And everything has its place.
Now, this has potential.
But should it go here?
Here?
Or perhaps here?
Or even here?
Perfect.
Fresh decorations show that the bower is in use.
translation.ko: 오래되지 않은 장식을 보면 사용 중인 바우어임을 알 수 있죠

translation.en: And the fancier it is, the more likely it'll impress a female.
translation.ko: 장식이 화려할수록 암컷의 시선을 더 끌 수 있습니다

translation.en: He's hung hundreds of baubles already.
translation.ko: 벌써 장식 구를 수백 개나 달았죠

translation.en: But apparently, there's a point
when there's just one too many.
translation.ko: 하지만 하나씩 계속 달다 보면 너무 과한 순간이 오고 맙니다

translation.en: In keeping with his brown color scheme,
MacGregor is hoping dead flowers will be an added attraction.
translation.ko: 갈색 톤과 일관성을 유지하며 매력을 더하길 바랍니다

translation.en: Decor is often down to local fashion.
In this valley, blue is the thing.
So will these berries catch the eye?
There's another unwelcome guest at MacGregor's.
This could be bad.
But it's also an opportunity for MacGregor to practice an important skill.
translation.ko: 하지만 필살기를 연습할 절호의 기회일 수도 있죠

translation.en: Mimicry.
Pretty impressive.
And how about his squealing pig?
He can also do... the local dogs.
Pigs don't like dogs.
So, what will this pig think about a bark with more bite?
translation.ko: 더 사나운 개 소리를 들려주면 어떤 생각이 들까요?

translation.en: There's more to this mimicry than scaring pigs.
translation.ko: 단순히 돼지를 겁주는 게 이 기술의 전부는 아닙니다

translation.en: It's also key to courting a partner.
He's in luck.
A female has heard him and drops in for a closer look.
translation.ko: 암컷이 그 소리를 듣고 가까이에서 보려고 들렀습니다

translation.en: Time for the blind audition.
He must now give her his full repertoire.
First up, the songs of forest birds.
Moving on to other sounds he's picked up from a nearby village.
translation.ko: 근처 마을에서 듣고 모사한 소리로 넘어가죠

translation.en: Like chopping wood.
-[chatters in human-like voice] -People talking.
And, most remarkably...
children playing!
She's impressed.
And who wouldn't be?
-A final dog bark... -[barks]
and it's on to stage two.
A game of hide and seek.
To keep her keen, he can't be seen.
translation.ko: 호기심을 계속 자극하려면 보이면 안 됩니다

translation.en: This teasing game can go on for 20 minutes or more.
translation.ko: 이렇게 애태우며 20분 혹은 그 이상 놀기도 하죠

translation.en: Flame is in luck, too.
A female flame has come to check him out.
She replies to his call, a good sign.
translation.ko: 암컷이 수컷의  소리에 화답하는 건 좋은 징조입니다

translation.en: Now, how to coax her into his bower?
translation.ko: 어떻게 하면 바우어 속으로 암컷을 꾈 수 있을까요?

translation.en: Will contracting and expanding his pupil be the right lure?
translation.ko: 동공을 줄였다 키웠다 하면 암컷이 넘어올까요?

translation.en: She seems to like it.
One more step and she'll be in his bower.
translation.ko: 한 걸음만 내디디면 바우어에 안착할 겁니다

translation.en: Oh. Too much eye work, perhaps.
Back at MacGregor's, it's time for the crazy thistle head.
translation.ko: 다시 맥그레거에게 돌아와서 머리 깃 세우기 수법을 보시죠

translation.en: She's seen enough...
but perhaps she'll be back later.
The game's not yet up for Flame.
His date is back.
And he's trying something new.
He still needs to get her into his bower,
translation.ko: 암컷이 바우어 안으로 들어와 줘야 합니다

translation.en: and a bit of blue beak bling might be just the thing.
translation.ko: 부리에 문 푸른 장식이 도움이 될지도 모르죠

translation.en: At last, she's right where he wants her.
translation.ko: 드디어 수컷이 바란 대로 암컷이 자리를 잡았습니다

translation.en: Time for his signature dance:
the matador.
-[squawks] -Oh, dear! The pressure's getting to him.
Take two.
Everything seems to be going like clockwork.
translation.ko: 모든 게 시계 방향처럼 완벽하게 돌아갑니다

translation.en: His final move is odd.
But it's all part of the routine.
And this is his only contribution to fatherhood.
translation.ko: 처음이자 마지막으로 아버지의 역할을 다하고 떠납니다

translation.en: Bowerbirds play the mating game alone.
But in the jungles of Central and South America,
there are some birds whose only hope of finding love
is teamwork.
This is a Guianan cock-of-the-rock.
Every morning, a posse of males gathers in this patch of forest
translation.ko: 매일 아침 일군의 수컷 무리가 이 구역에 몰려듭니다

translation.en: in the hope of some female action.
They're not exactly friends but they need one another to succeed.
translation.ko: 친한 사이는 아니지만 짝짓기하려면 서로가 필요하죠

translation.en: So, chaos must give way to order.
This is a communal display ground,
or lek.
At the lek, every male has his own dancing area.
And the more males there are,
the more likely females will visit.
Teamwork is even more important for some performers in Panama.
translation.ko: 팀워크가 훨씬 더 중요한 파나마의 춤꾼들도 있습니다

translation.en: This is the dancing perch of a male lance-tailed manakin.
But to attract a female, one manakin just won't cut it.
translation.ko: 암컷 한 마리를 유혹하려면 무희새 한 마리로는 부족하죠

translation.en: So... he has a wingman.
The manakins here are part of a 21-year study,
and this pair has worked together for five years.
translation.ko: 이 듀오는 5년간 함께 공연해 왔다고 합니다

translation.en: They're a well-oiled machine.
And the most successful duo in this forest.
Rehearsal over,
the pair go in search of a mate.
They advertise their readiness with a duet.
And their calls have been answered.
Now, they show her their stage with a round of flybys.
So far, so good.
But will their routine hit the mark?
translation.ko: 하지만 이 안무가 암컷의 마음을 사로잡을까요?

translation.en: If it does, only the alpha will mate.
translation.ko: 이 방법이 통한다면 더 센 수컷이 짝짓기할 겁니다

translation.en: The wingman's only here
to make his boss look good.
But, before deciding,
female manakins always check out the competition.
translation.ko: 무희새 암컷은 늘 두 마리의 경연을 참관합니다

translation.en: Oh, shame!
At the cock-of-the-rock lek,
the judges are taking their seats.
It's got the posse excited again.
Order restored, each takes his position.
translation.ko: 다시 질서정연하게 자기 위치에서 자리 잡습니다

translation.en: And presents his best side.
translation.ko: 가장 예쁜 부위가 암컷 쪽으로 보이게 서죠

translation.en: They'll be judged on their rear ends.
It takes a trained eye to spot the prettiest bottom.
translation.ko: 가장 예쁜 엉덩이를 포착하려면 노련한 안목이 필요합니다

translation.en: But there's more to the contest than that.
Wait for it...
Yeah, okay, it's not exactly Swan Lake,
but it's enough to make the final choice easier.
But is this male as impressive... up close?
translation.ko: 가까이에서 봐도 이 수컷이 맘에 들까요?

translation.en: He must keep hopping until he gets the okay.
translation.ko: 최종 허락을 받아낼 때까지 계속 콩콩 뛰어야 합니다

translation.en: Not everyone's best pleased about that.
translation.ko: 이런 결과가 다 맘에 드는 건 아니죠

translation.en: But the competition isn't over yet.
There are still other females to win over,
so they must keep hopping.
But when the next female chooses...
it's the same guy!
Research has shown that most matings
translation.ko: 연구에 따르면 한 무대에서 성사되는 짝짓기는 대개 한 수컷이 독식한다고 하죠

translation.en: at a lek are with one male.
translation.ko: 한 무대에서 성사되는 짝짓기는 대개 한 수컷이 독식한다고 하죠

translation.en: But only the females know
translation.ko: 하지만 다른 수컷들보다 그 수컷이 특별한 이유는

translation.en: what he has that the others don't.
translation.ko: 하지만 다른 수컷들보다 그 수컷이 특별한 이유는 오직 암컷들만 알고 있습니다

translation.en: Still, until the last female's gone, there's always hope.
translation.ko: 마지막 암컷이 가기 전까진 아직 희망이 있습니다

translation.en: The manakin A-team are hopeful, too.
The female's back.
And the duo picks up where they left off.
translation.ko: 듀오는 아까 못다 한 안무를 이어갑니다

translation.en: But the final act... is a solo.
translation.ko: 하지만 공연의 대단원은 한 마리가 장식하죠

translation.en: So, when it's time to go it alone,
the alpha calls at his wingman to leave.
translation.ko: 더 센 수컷은 바람잡이에게 그만 가라고 신호합니다

translation.en: Last year, this male was the most successful in the study.
translation.ko: 연구팀은 작년에 이 수컷이 가장 인기가 좋았다고 합니다

translation.en: But he can't afford to relax.
Research has shown that older females, like this one,
translation.ko: 이 암컷처럼 원숙한 암컷들은 경험 많은 수컷들이

translation.en: make experienced males work harder for their affections.
translation.ko: 더 적극적으로 구애하도록 깐깐하게 군다고 합니다

translation.en: So he must dazzle her with each of his dance moves.
translation.ko: 그러니 수컷도 다양한 안무로 암컷을 매료시켜야 하죠

translation.en: Now comes the highlight of the whole performance.
Cue drumroll...
The perch bounces.
She likes them!
All that's left is to bow...
and mate.
The wingman can only look on.
Perhaps next year, he'll be on top.
Back in New Guinea,
there's one dancing bird that has it all...
translation.ko: 모든 걸 다 가진 춤꾼이 있다고 하는데요

translation.en: the perfect arena,
the most varied dance routine,
and he does it all by himself.
You could say... he's the greatest showman.
This is his personal display court.
He's a bird of paradise,
-[high-pitched squawk] -a Carola's parotia,
and his name's Bob.
Bob is obsessed with tidiness.
But it's vital housework.
Female Carolas don't visit messy display courts.
translation.ko: 구애 장소가 지저분하면 암컷이 찾아오지 않기 때문입니다

translation.en: Every leaf must go.
translation.ko: 나뭇잎 한 장도 있어선 안 됩니다

translation.en: Perfect.
But Bob's jobs are not done.
There's other groundwork to do.
His arena is carpeted with moss.
And there are a few areas to attend to.
translation.ko: 좀 더 신경 써야 할 곳이 남았습니다

translation.en: Splendid!
Chores finished, Bob limbers up.
Carolas spend more time rehearsing their displays
than any other bird of paradise.
The ballerina is just one of nine carefully choreographed moves.
translation.ko: 이 발레리나 동작은 정교한 9개 안무 중 하나일 뿐이죠

translation.en: And each will have to be done in exactly the right order,
translation.ko: 9개의 안무를 정확한 순서대로 선보여야 할 겁니다

translation.en: making it the most complex dance of any bird.
translation.ko: 그 어떤 새의 춤보다 복잡한 춤이죠

translation.en: Even the pauses between moves are important to the routine.
translation.ko: 안무 사이에 잠시 멈추는 것마저 중요한 동작입니다

translation.en: And it's not just what he does but where.
translation.ko: 춤 동작도 중요하지만 어디에서 추는지도 보세요

translation.en: Dancing under his perch is crucial,
translation.ko: 홰 밑에서 춤추는 건 대단히 중요합니다

translation.en: as it's from here a female will view his performance.
translation.ko: 이 위에서 암컷이 공연을 감상할 테니까요

translation.en: But even the most serious dancer can tire of practicing.
translation.ko: 춤밖에 모르는 춤꾼이라도 연습하다 지칠 수 있습니다

translation.en: Particularly when no one's even watching.
-So, it's off to lunch. -[chirrups]
With Bob gone, others slide in.
translation.ko: 밥이 가버리자 낯선 새가 무대를 차지합니다

translation.en: A juvenile male
and his equally juvenile male friend.
One day, they'll both have their own courts
but until then, they must seize every chance to practice.
translation.ko: 그때까진 모든 연습 기회를 활용해야 하죠

translation.en: With two, they can role-play.
A dancer...
and a judging female.
But time's up.
Bob's back.
This youngster wants to stick around
and learn from an expert.
But playtime is over.
And not a moment too soon.
A female Carola.
But she's not looking for love.
translation.ko: 하지만 짝짓기를 염두에 둔 게 아닙니다

translation.en: She's after nest material.
Best get rid of her.
When you're a Carola's parotia,
there's no such thing as downtime.
To succeed, Bob knows his routine must be faultless.
translation.ko: 짝짓기에 성공하려면 실수는 용납되지 않는다는 걸 밥은 잘 알죠

translation.en: So it's practice, practice, practice.
translation.ko: 그러니 뭐니 뭐니 해도 연습만이 답입니다

translation.en: Aha! Another female!
This one seems interested in him,
so it's showtime.
Bob opens with a perch pivot,
the first of his nine moves.
With the female getting closer, it's time for move two.
translation.ko: 암컷이 더 가까이 오면 2번 동작을 선보입니다

translation.en: The court hops.
Then smartly onto move three,
the swaying bounce.
The mossy carpet helps keep Bob's feet firmly on the ground.
translation.ko: 이끼가 덮인 무대 덕에 밥의 발은 땅에 단단히 고정됩니다

translation.en: But he needs her on his perch.
translation.ko: 하지만 밥은 암컷이 자신의 홰에 올라가길 바라죠

translation.en: Yes!
But what's this?
A plus-one?
-[squawks shrilly] -It's another adult male.
He could prove trouble but Bob must press on.
translation.ko: 골칫거리가 될 수도 있지만 일단 공연을 강행해야 하죠

translation.en: A Carola display could last hours.
translation.ko: 캐롤라여왕극락조의 구애는 몇 시간 동안 이어지기도 합니다

translation.en: And there are points for stamina.
The arrival of a second male is more worrying.
translation.ko: 다른 수컷이 또 도착하자 걱정은 더 커집니다

translation.en: Suddenly, Bob's surrounded by rivals,
here to break up his date.
If he loses focus now, she may visit one of their courts instead.
translation.ko: 지금 집중력이 흐트러지면 암컷을 뺏길지도 모릅니다

translation.en: And he's still got a lot to get through.
Next, move four.
The head tilts.
But all that noise is just too distracting.
translation.ko: 하지만 너무 시끄러워서 정신을 집중할 수 없습니다

translation.en: He must show them who's boss.
translation.ko: 누가 이 무대의 주인인지 보여줘야 하죠

translation.en: And this bit of leaf could be the answer.
translation.ko: 이 나뭇잎 조각이 해결책이 될 수도 있습니다

translation.en: It's a badge of ownership, a Carola's way of saying:
translation.ko: 영역 소유권을 증명하는 거죠 캐롤라 방식으로 경고하는 겁니다 '여긴 내 무대니까 사라져'

translation.en: "This is my court. Get lost."
translation.ko: 캐롤라 방식으로 경고하는 겁니다 '여긴 내 무대니까 사라져'

translation.en: It's odd...
but it works.
But now, something's wrong.
Has she lost interest,
or is he trying to woo her at the wrong end of the perch?
translation.ko: 아니면 잘못된 방향에서 유혹하고 있는 걸까요?

translation.en: Fortunately, Bob's remembered that female Carolas
like to look down on their would-be partners.
translation.ko: 암컷은 수컷의 구애를 내려다보길 좋아한다는 것을요

translation.en: So it's back to business, and the second round of court hops.
translation.ko: 다시 공연으로 돌아가서 두 번째 콩콩 뛰기에 돌입하죠

translation.en: Move five.
Now on to the next move:
the hop and shake.
Number six,
where he'll fluff his feathers, shuffle forward,
and stick his head under his wing.
Fluff, shuffle, wing.
Fluff...
shuffle... wing.
Still looking good above.
So it's time for moves seven, eight and nine.
The bow, ballerina and head bobs,
translation.ko: 인사, 발레리나 목을 쭉 뽑아 흔들기죠

translation.en: the moves that mark him out as surely the finest dancer of them all.
Take it away, Bob!
♪ I was dancing when I was twelve ♪
Some male Carolas never win the female...
translation.ko: 평생 짝짓기를 못 하는 캐롤라여왕극락조 수컷도 있습니다

translation.en: but Bob's chances are looking good.
Even the pauses are holding her interest.
translation.ko: 잠시 멈춘 상태라도 암컷은 시선을 떼지 못합니다

translation.en: Fluttering wings are her way of saying: "Nice job, Bob."
translation.ko: 암컷이 날개를 파르르 떠는 건 맘에 든다는 표시입니다

translation.en: It's the sign he's been hoping for.
Hurrah!
-But despite Bob's virtuoso performance... -[squawks]
she may never want to see him again.
translation.ko: 암컷은 밥을 또 만날 생각이 없을지도 모릅니다

translation.en: Oh, well.
